data.name: Beware of Dog
data.detailed_description:
Visual style of the game

The game currently uses temporary assets. The goal is to have all original assets by the release. The planned visual style is realistic/slightly stylized.


About the Game

Uplifted is an extremely fast paced first person shooter with an emphasis on rapid movement and melee combat but featuring a selection of guns as well. You play as an uplifted or intelligent Cheetah, augmented with bionics, who one day finds himself alone in a laboratory, without any memories of the past or even the understanding of who - or what - he is. Armed with his newly found intelligence and his animal instincts, as well as his combat attachments, he has to fight to find out why he exists, who created him, what happened to his creators, and, hopefully, find a place for himself in the human world that was forced on him.

Features:

  • Fast paced first person view action
  • Movement mechanics such as dash, wall run and slide
  • Extensive use of grappling hook for traversal and in combat
  • Go into the overdrive mode to temporarily increase your speed and power
  • A variety of close quarters combat moves
  • An arsenal of weapons that can be used as an alternative to melee
  • Combat mechanics involving identifying and attacking weak spots on the enemies
  • An engaging story

data.short_description: Uplifted is an extremely fast paced first person shooter with an emphasis on movement and melee combat but featuring a selection of guns as well. You play as an uplifted or intelligent Cheetah, augmented with bionics, who has to fight for survival in the world that he does not understand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 3000 Mhz x4 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 compatible, 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains Intense Violence, Blood and Gore, Dismemberment and Decapitation on Human and Non-Human characters.
